nodes.text: The Battle-class ship was a starship design built by shipwrights affiliated with the Metatheran Cartel.

In 31 BBY, the Metatheran Cartel used the Battle-class ship XP-38 to destroy Velin Wir's jungle base on the planet Cularin. The Cartel then gave the ship to the people of Cularin as a gift, to try and improve the damage to public relations between the Cartel and Cularin that Wir had caused.
